messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the threshold for a Hard success in a Call of Cthulhu skill check?
A roll equal to or below half skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the threshold for an Extreme success in a Call of Cthulhu skill check?
A roll equal to or below one-fifth of skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the difficulty level when a non-player character is positively inclined towards the player's goal?
No modification to the difficulty level is required
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is the difficulty level affected when a non-player character is strongly opposed to the player's goal?
The difficulty is raised by one or two levels
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the criteria for an Extreme success?
An Extreme success is if the roll is equal to or below one-fifth of the opposing skill.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when a non-player character is positively inclined towards the player's goal?
The Keeper should not bother rolling dice, but simply have them agree.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the difficulty level change when a non-player character is strongly opposed to the player's goal?
The difficulty is raised by one or two levels.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the Keeper adjust the difficulty level when the player supports their case or is willing to use a weapon?
The Keeper should lower the difficulty by one level.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the lowest chance of success required for an Extreme success?
equal to or below one-fifth of the skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can there be no chance of success in some rare circumstances?
yes, and the Keeper may rule that there is no chance of success
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How did the difficulty level begin for the cultist?
Regular
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How did the Keeper increase the difficulty level for the cultist?
by two steps to Extreme
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why does the Keeper increase the difficulty level after Brian threatens violence?
The Keeper increases the difficulty level by two steps to Extreme.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the difficulty level after Brian fails to succeed in the Intimidation roll?
The Keeper lowers the difficulty level to Hard.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the consequence of the Keeper not being compelled to reveal the contact's name?
It is entirely up to the Keeper whether the doctor is forthcoming.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Brian if he had succeeded in the Intimidation roll?
The Keeper would be compelled to give up the name of the contact.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the consequence of failing the Intimidation roll?
The Keeper is entirely up to whether the doctor is forthcoming.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the chance of succeeding in both Mechanical Repair and Electrical Repair rolls?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the chance of succeeding in a simultaneous roll?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines whether a situation calls for sequential skill rolls or a combined skill roll?
The Keeper's discretion.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the player succeeds in the Intimidation roll?
The Keeper would be compelled to give up the name of the contact.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the chance of succeeding in both Mechanical Repair and Electrical Repair rolls?
The chance of succeeding in both would be 1%.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What skill roll would allow Harvey to see the cultist?
A successful Spot Hidden roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can the Keeper decide to make a combined skill roll?
The Keeper must decide whether a situation calls for sequential skill rolls or a combined skill roll.
